title: Andrew Lincoln's father wasn't a survivor of the 1972 Addis air disaster.
subtitle: Mimi Zora claims that the father of the star of "the walking dead" was in a 1972 plane crash in the Andes, and survived by eating the other passengers.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Andrew Lincoln's father was in a plane crash in 1972 in Mount Andes and survived by eating other passengers.
